name: Meuureh
description:
Meeureh 

a traditional custom from the land of Aceh

This game is an educational game about climate change and an introduction to the traditional customs of the Acehnese people in protecting their farms or plantations from pests. 

This game is aimed at elementary school children, with games that are easy to understand by elementary school children.

Currently the meuureh game is still in the development stage and there is only Indonesian language. The meuureh game itself was developed using RPG MAKER MV software.

Wait for the next update until the release stage.

Stay Tuned! :)

Developed by :
